passives.effects: Dealing [[Ability_effects#Triggering_from_champion_ability_damage|ability damage]] to a champion at {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 600 or more units away from the cast position {{tip|standard sight|reveals}} them for 6 seconds.
passives.name: Hypershot

passives.effects: Upon triggering ''Hypershot'', grant {{tip|sight}} of the {{tt|area|Grants sight through terrain and brush}} {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1400 units around the target for 2 seconds and apply ''Hypershot's'' effects to enemy champions within the area for 3 seconds.
passives.name: Focus
